description:
Down-on-his-luck pizza chef Peppino Spaghetti and his restaurant are threatened by a sentient floating pizza... and this time
all of his abilities are gone, too! Climb up and bring down the Pizza Tower to save your restaurant in this cheesy, saucy,
Wario Land 4-inspired platformer!

1.0.1.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.0.1
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

An update for both the apworld and client. Please be sure to download both. Updating your YAML is recommended. Here are the major changes:
- Added outfits as filler items. This can be toggled in the YAML
- Added universal tracker support
- D-pad can now be used to navigate the AP login menu
- Spaces can now be used in the AP login menu
- Trying to play multiple Pizza Tower slots on one PC will now work
- "Normal" logic now no longer expects using Noise's crusher move more than once before touching the ground

Some bug fixes:
- P ranks will no longer be overridden by S ranks in certain situations
- Noise will no longer lose his gloves when exiting a secret
- Various logic fixes
1.0.1.title: v1.0.1

1.1.0.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.1.0
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

A major update for both the apworld and the client, make sure to update both of them. Updating your YAML is recommended as well. This patch is for the most recent Pizza Tower version (v1.1.28) and will not work on any older versions, it's recommended to boot up the vanilla game first to make sure you're on the right patch.

Changes:
- Added a new Lap 2 Portals item that will enable all lap 2 portals in your game when received, this can be toggled in the YAML.
- Added a new Pumpkin Checks option, when toggled this will add all pumpkins as locations and allows the new Pumpkin item to be shuffled into the item pool. Pumpkins are needed to access Tricky Treat, the amount of pumpkins that are shuffled into the pool and the cost of Tricky Treat are configurable in the YAML.
- Added options for trap and filler weights.
- Implemented get_filler_item_name() function to better support item links.
- S and P ranks now have dedicated rules instead of using the rules for a standard level clear.
- Fake Santa Trap disappears on level restart or exit now.
- Player aliases are now used for the in-game text pop-ups instead.

Bugfixes:
- Fixed a major logic issue where only the last written rule would actually be applied.
- Prevent any invalid packets from immediately crashing the game.
- Fixed an items index desync that could occur when the server was shut down.
- Trip to the Warzone chef task is not granted from a Timer Trap anymore.
- Floor rank chef task logic works as intended now.
- Numerous other logic fixes.
1.1.0.title: v1.1.0

1.2.0.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.2.0
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

This is a major update for both the client mod and APWorld. Please check that both are up to date before you play! It's recommended that you update your YAML as well.
We've also whipped up a new custom text client to fix some persistent issues, so make sure to read the setup guide carefully; the process may be a bit different than you're used to.

Here are the major changes:

Changes:
- Added optional transformation randomization: when toggled, this will randomize all transformations in the rando list as items hidden behind checks. You will be locked out of using these transformations until you find/receive them (feel free to hunt for all of the lock-out cutscenes!)
- Added full Ring Link functionality: when toggled, several point sources (toppins, escape clocks, big toppins and pizzasonas) will add rings/points across all supported games with the feature enabled. These will be deducted while in Pizza Time or when damaged. 1 ring is equivalent to 10 points in Pizza Tower.
- (Finally) added functional support for Unix-based platforms interfacing via Wine/Proton (Mac, Linux, Steam Deck)
- Implemented an all-new text client for the game that acts as a proxy server which interfaces via a compressed websocket connection. Using this new client is now required to connect to Archipelago servers (which means you must install the game's apworld into your Archipelago Launcher)
- Added a queue system for traps and Death Link, allowing for all received traps and Death Link events to properly activate as soon as possible
- Allowed Death Link events to be executed in hub areas
- Added support for location groups: when prompted to enter a location in your YAML file, you may enter the name of a level to indicate all locations within that level
- Added a new login room background drawn by FuzzyEpic3

Bugfixes:
- Fixed a crash that would sometimes occur in the main menu after disconnecting
- Fixed a softlock that would occur in boss fights if the War Timer trap was received
- Fixed a bug where the pumpkin count would break when the /collect command was used
- Fixed a crash that would occur in the final judgement screen if your language file was invalid
- Fixed a freeze that would occur if an in-game message contained an alias name with curly brackets
- Various logic tweaks
1.2.0.title: v1.2.0

1.2.1.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.2.1
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

This is a hotfix update for both the client mod and APWorld. Please check that both are up to date before you play! It's recommended that you update your YAML as well, as we have added an extra option to it.

Here are the changes and bugfixes:

Changes:
- Added music randomization: when toggled, all level and hub music (including bosses but excluding Pizzaface for the moment) will be randomized based on the room seed upon starting a save file
- Added escape music randomization: when music randomization is toggled, each escape sequence has a randomized music track (includes Pizza Time tracks, Lap 2 tracks, CTOP tracks and Pizza Mayhem)
- Reduced traffic between the client's proxy server and the game itself, as well as adding other client optimizations
- Added transformation/move randomization to the slot data, mainly for Poptracker to be allowed to work properly with the new update

Bugfixes:
- Fixed a crash that would occur if the game tried to read non-existent datapackage cache files
- Re-fixed a freeze that would occur if an in-game message contained an alias name with curly brackets
- Fixed an oversight that would cause a Death Link trap to be received by the player if they died themselves
- Various logic tweaks
1.2.1.title: v1.2.1

1.2.2.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.2.2
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

This is a hotfix update for both the client mod and APWorld. Please check that both are up to date before you play! If updating from v1.2.0 or earlier, it's recommended that you update your YAML as well.

Here are the changes and bugfixes:

Changes:
- Added a couple of new songs to the music randomization pool (Hip to Be Italian, both pause menu tracks and Move It Boy)
- Added a version indicator to the main menu, so you can easily check if you are running the latest version or not
- Removed the lock on Noise's jetpack transformation in Freezerator, which was imposed if you didn't have Satan's Choice unlocked
- Edited the AP room's text to specify that Pizza Tower's specific text client is required to connect to a server

Bugfixes:
- Fixed a crash that would sometimes occur if you broke Pillar John in CTOP with music randomization enabled
- Fixed some oversights with the location check system that caused performance issues for some players
- Fixed an oversight that caused the AP room's music (Gustavo's tutorial music) to persist after a successful connection
- Various logic tweaks, including a fix for a crash that was caused by a logic oversight
1.2.2.title: v1.2.2

1.2.3.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.2.3
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

This is a patch for both the client mod and APWorld. Please check that both are up to date before you play! If updating from v1.2.0 or earlier, it's recommended that you update your YAML as well.

Here are the changes and bugfixes:

Changes:
- Added a new animation to the Archipelago login screen
- Hints show which floor the check will be located on
- When enabling both move and transformation randomization, the 2 items forced into the first sphere will not be local anymore
- Gustavo's Spin Attack is now considered progression

Bugfixes:
- Fixed a crash related to the deathlink text
- Fixed an issue where the rocket item was being saved as firemouth in the savefile
- Fixed an issue where ringlink would send the amount as a float instead of an int as intended
- Fixed an issue where the pumpkin counter was being counted up incorrectly when syncing locations with the server
- Various logic tweaks
1.2.3.title: v1.2.3

1.2.4.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.2.4
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

This is a minor hotfix patch only for the APWorld, it's not necessary to update the client this time.

Here are the bugfixes:

Bugfixes:
- Fixed a rule parsing issue when playing as Noise in expert difficulty.
- Fixed an issue where location entrance info in hints did not match up with the actual entrances in-game.
1.2.4.title: v1.2.4

1.2.5.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.2.5
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

It's October! That means the mod is entirely unplayable now, apparently. Let's fix that.

This is a very small update for both the client and the APWorld. No YAML changes are necessary.

- Exorcised the evil spirits of October that made the game crash on load
- The gate for The Crumbling Tower of Pizza now appears once the final boss is defeated (a little sooner than usual)
- Added toggles for ringlink and deathlink
- Added a notification if your mod version and APWorld version don't match
- YAML is no longer required by the universal tracker
1.2.5.title: v1.2.5

1.2.5a.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.2.5a
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

A few minor issues were left behind while we were busy ghostbusting, this hotfix patch is for both the Pizza Tower text client in the APWorld and the mod client.

- Fixed a crash issue in the Pizza Tower text client when updating tags from the slot data
- Fixed steamworks referring to the incorrect game ID
1.2.5a.title: v1.2.5a

release.description:
# Pizza Tower Archipelago v1.0.0
[Setup](https://github.com/unsafetyskizzers/Archipelago/blob/pizza_ap/worlds/pizza_tower/docs/setup_en.md) | [Mod Page](https://gamebanana.com/mods/598236)

*Hello there...!*
This is the first public release of Pizza Tower Archipelago. After over a month of hard work, I hope it's fun (and stable!) to play.
## What's in the box:
* Randomization of your Toppins and moveset across the Multiworld
* Toppins and level clears as locations, with treasures, secrets, S ranks, P ranks, and chef tasks as optional locations
* Level gates, boss gates, and secrets can be shuffled
* Customizable boss gate costs
* Death link support
* Extra options to make the early game less restrictive
* Both characters and swap mode supported
* More in the future... stay tuned!
release.title: v1.0.0
